喚作.definition: to be called; to be known as

喚做.definition: to be called; to be referred to as

喚起.definition: to waken (to action); to rouse (the masses); to evoke (attention, recollection etc)

喚雨呼風.definition: to call the wind and summon the rain (idiom); to exercise magical powers; fig. to stir up troubles; also 呼風喚雨|呼风唤雨[hu1 feng1 huan4 yu3]

喚頭.definition: percussion instrument used by street peddlers, barbers etc to attract attention
